sentence: When he gave us the receipt and indicated to put our room number down he was very clear on where we would put how much we wanted to tip him
The hotel was nice but room was a little cramped and I found it odd kids shows had to be paid for
No available rooms on other side of hotel
The shower would have great pressure for about a minute and then drip to barely one strand of water
Also the water pressure in the shower was spotty
Curiously the HDTV offered only analog stations so it was like watching a tv from the 1990s
My main positive experience was the heated pool and hot tub especially during sow season and it being empty
room was too small water temp from the showerhead kept changing every few seconds tv channels did nt have much selections
The shower was almost impossible to manipulate to regulate the water temp
The towels in my room were stained
Nice to have drinking water bottles provided for free in our room
Fantastic like new nice staff excellent facilities massive TV From Australia you never know what you ’re going to get until you arrive this place is amazing for the money
Since remodel beautiful modern room with big screen lg tv with built in chrome cast beautiful bath room free wifi

This Hyat was really beautifully redesigned with a lot of small touches in the room book reading light stocked Keurig with bedtime tea and coffee sound panel behind the TV and even a digital clock inside the mirror in the bathroom to keep track of getting ready timeLocation had no real attraction other that it was in a very convenient area
Nice place smaller room no bathtub
An upscale hotel with comfy but small rooms and pretty good amenities
Great comfortable bed and pilowsClean and beautiful bathroom little balcony fantastic
My room was clean fresh and felt new as it was recently remodeled
They cleaned the room after we had been here the first night while we were out for the day and did a great job
I ended up staying at 3 separate hotels and this was the best room and food of the three
